page.title: 01OUR AREA
page.content: It is{a fairly rural area}which includes parts of the two villages of {Bolney}in the south and{Warninglid}in the north.{Of the two villages Bolney {is the larger.}It has a P.O.,a small general stores,a bakery,a butcher,a small supermarket,2 public houses,2 small market gardens,a road haulier's, 2 garages,a vineyard,a restaurant,C.of E.church and an Evangelical chapel. { Warninglid}has 1 C.of E.church,a small vineyard and 2 public houses only centrally,although there is a Southern Counties Fuel Depot,an egg farm,the Taverner's Hotel and Restaurant,a forge,a stud farm,a residential caravan park and a large King Bros.Caravan Sales Co. nearby. The area is largely{grazing}though {apples,soft fruit and vines}are grown. We also have some{woodland}grown for papermaking.The A23 passes through it.
